name: Space Survival (itch) (sy77)
description:
Welcome to the game of space survival. You are a space traveler searching for the planet which is suitable for your survival like earth. You made an emergency landing on a certain planet. You gotta mine minerals for launching your space shuttle, and be cautious about extraterrestrial lives attacking you. Good luck!

movement: WASD

expand inventory : E key

Controll the rocket: Space key, Arrow Keys

# you can press / key and cheat!
